Breaking Down the Infamous Alameda Balance Sheet https://www.coindesk.com/policy/2023/09/20/writing-down-the-inknown-alameda-balance-sheet/?utm_medium=referral&utm_source=rss&utm_campaign=headlines T7A7LPAPJBHKZHU2SMIGIVKRLU Danny Nelson, Nick BakerThe infamous balance sheet of Sam Bankman-Fried’s trading firm, Alameda Research, served as the basis for a Nov. 2, 2022, story by CoinDesk’s Ian Allison. The article raised questions about how sturdy the company’s financial underpinnings were – and, by extension, how safe Bankman-Fried’s better-known crypto exchange FTX was. For the protection of our sources we are not publishing the document itself but rather describing its contents – in finer detail than ever before.
